page.title: 09The Clubs of Halstead Kent
page.content:
We are very lucky in Halstead because there are lots of clubs for adults and children.
Adults Children {Football Club Venture Scouts {Cricket Club Junior Football {Horticultural Soc. Saturday Club {St Margaret's Players Di's Dancers {Womens Institute Brownies {Wives Fellowship Cubs {Badgers Club Ballet {Netball Club Scouts & Guides
For example St Margarets Players has been a source of entertainment in the village for many years. Whilst the Wives Fellowship and W.I. invite speakers of interest throughout the year. Moreover the football, netball and cricket clubs present sporting opportunities throughout the year.
